statements: SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, email FROM user_data ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username, age, favorite_genre FROM user_data WHERE favorite_genre = 'Action'
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_data WHERE favorite_genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE age < 30 AND favorite_genre != 'Pop' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE '%John%' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE favorite_genre IN ('Pop', 'R&B') ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;

SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, recommendation_text FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id;

SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM content_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' AND language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM content_recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email, genre FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM viewed_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1002 ORDER BY view_timestamp ASC;

SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 1
SELECT users.username, interests.interest_name FROM users JOIN interests ON users.user_id = interests.user_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT content_id, title, genre, rating FROM content ORDER BY release_date DESC

SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, genre, timestamp FROM user_preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT content_id, title, rating FROM content WHERE genre = 'Sci-Fi' AND rating > 8.0 ORDER BY release_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.title, r.recommendation_score FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN content c ON r.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.age < 25 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
